Articles.Content:
Dreamliners Launch Site Expansion
EARTH UHD FOR KSRSS REQUIRED

This is a mod for KSRSS adding the following launch sites for you (yes you!) to enjoy

Update III and IV Out Now!

Thank you @Spike88For Help on these sites!

NEW DEPENDENCY CHECH THE LIST!
 



The Retro Update
and

The TAL update

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Explore the wonders of 1959-1998 with the new retro update!

this update includes

-Old Kourou

-Old Vandenberg

*NEW to both configs -Langley Airforce base

*NEW to both configs -White Sands Test range

-Old Wallops

*NEW to both configs -Edwards Airforce base

-Old Woomera

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Explore the Shuttle TAL abort landing sites with the new TAL update

This update includes
 

Andersen AFB

Banjul

Ben Guerir

Casablanca

Colonge Bonn

Dakar

Deigo Garcia

Easter Island

Hao

Istres-Le-Tube

Kano Moron

Fairford

Rota

Zaragoza

Bermuda

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Skip to bottom to see new locations!]
                                     [too many TAL sites for pictures, go see them yourself!]                                    

 

License: CC BY-NC-SA
 I have only done the configs I have not done any work with making the ingame assets


- Wallops Flight Facility


more: https://imgur.com/a/qSydY7A


-Vandenberg Space force Base

more: https://imgur.com/a/RovV4KD

-Regan Test Site

More: https://imgur.com/a/fIQacM2

-Kodiak Pacific Spaceport Complex

More: https://imgur.com/a/4aRvq0b

-Tanegashima Space Center

More: https://imgur.com/a/HTJDmNk

-Starbase/Masseys

More:https://imgur.com/a/5yczSNP

-Kourou


More:https://imgur.com/a/dxnF5KQ

-Van Horn

 

 

-Mahia Peninsula



-Satish Dhawan

 

-Mojave


 

-Bowen Space Port

 

-Woomera Kistler

(NEW CONTENT FROM UPDATE III BELOW)

-Old Kourou

 

-Old Wallops

 

-Old Vandenberg

 

-Langley Airforce Base

 

-Old Woomera

 

-White Sands

-Edwards

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dependencies

Kerbal Konstructs

Tundra's Space Center

Omega's Stockalike Structures

Module Manager

Aurora Space Center

Starbase Parts 3.0

EarthUHD

Launch Sites Appended

Katniss Cape Canaveral

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FOR EARTHUHD

start with joining foxes discord https://www.patreon.com/posts/official-discord-90213020

 -Go to the rules channel and agree to them gain full channel access.

-Open the KSRSS Reborn section.

- Open KSRSS-installation text channel.

- Earth UHD download is at the bottom of the second post. Download this and any one of the three texture packs.

- Download and unzip (You will need 7zip to unpack the files properly.)

-Install EarthUHD into GameData.

You will also need BallisticFox's fork of Kopernicus. (linked below)

https://github.com/ballisticfox/Kopernicus/releases

(BallisticFox also has HD Moon and HD Mars textures available, they look great!)

Thanks to user OHN for basically typing all this out for me 

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Downloads
Spacedock (for final verisons) - Soon
Github (for development) - https://github.com/lsamman/Dreamliners-Site-Expansion

Soon.TM

Saxaford Spaceport

Spaceport Sutherland


Future Plans

Update SLC 37 and SLC-6

Update Starbase/Masseys to make it less depressing

Other smaller spaceports

Actual Terrain and not map decals (maybe)

Sounding rocket pads

(update 3 coming soon-ish)

Edited Wednesday at 04:32 PM by Dreamliner
minor tweaks
Nice work!
Working on more sites for DLSE looking at 3-4 new sites out for the update, 2 done so far

13 hours ago, Dreamliner said:

Working on more sites for DLSE looking at 3-4 new sites out for the update, 2 done so far 

looks cool
New DLSE update NET later today!

I've just sync'd with Github this morning, and as with the first time I tried these configs, everything is still underground/underwater. Here's some pictures and a link to my log file. I'll add some notes below, too ...

This is Kourou, and the Kourou group loaded into the editor. The group center is well underwater at 0 altitude.

Spoiler

Here's Vandenburg. All sites have the same issue for me.

Spoiler

 

And here's Vandenburg group in the editor, and raised up a bunch:

Spoiler

Any idea what might be happening on my system? My log file is here. This is a pretty minimal install, just solar system, some visual, some QoL. I should also mention that a) I do not have KSCSwitcher installed. b) The space center is positioned correctly at the Cape.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1QCUK4V1FaOYMtC_bvQqEvPOcwMUjs8Il?usp=sharing

Just raising the altitude of the groups doesn't really fix things, though - the decals are still not right - but I thought I'd start here with these images and see if you had any ideas. 

I noticed your github has a note about things being underwater - but you have screenshots, so I was hoping that was maybe fixed.

Thanks for working on this!

10 hours ago, OrbitalManeuvers said:

I've just sync'd with Github this morning, and as with the first time I tried these configs, everything is still underground/underwater. Here's some pictures and a link to my log file. I'll add some notes below, too ...

This is Kourou, and the Kourou group loaded into the editor. The group center is well underwater at 0 altitude.

  Reveal hidden contents

Here's Vandenburg. All sites have the same issue for me.

  Reveal hidden contents

 

And here's Vandenburg group in the editor, and raised up a bunch:

  Reveal hidden contents

Any idea what might be happening on my system? My log file is here. This is a pretty minimal install, just solar system, some visual, some QoL. I should also mention that a) I do not have KSCSwitcher installed. b) The space center is positioned correctly at the Cape.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1QCUK4V1FaOYMtC_bvQqEvPOcwMUjs8Il?usp=sharing

Just raising the altitude of the groups doesn't really fix things, though - the decals are still not right - but I thought I'd start here with these images and see if you had any ideas. 

I noticed your github has a note about things being underwater - but you have screenshots, so I was hoping that was maybe fixed.

Thanks for working on this!

Yeah thats a running issue, im still not too sure why its doing that on other people's installs are doing that, but something that could maybe have to do with it is im using  @ballisticfox0 Earth UHD 64k instead of the normal Earth-64k that comes with ksrss, actually id bet its that, unfortunately its only available through @ballisticfox0 's discord which is only available through patreon

The Earth UHD Download link is corrupt.  When I try to unzip it, Windows gives an error for both files.

9 minutes ago, MashAndBangers said:

The Earth UHD Download link is corrupt.

I had that same error when trying to unzip the 32k moon zip, also from ballisticfox, when using Windows 10 shell. I installed 7zip and that worked.
weird, also if anyone has site ideas lemme know, waiting to have enough for update 2

On 4/23/2024 at 6:48 AM, MashAndBangers said:

The Earth UHD Download link is corrupt.  When I try to unzip it, Windows gives an error for both files.

 

On 4/23/2024 at 7:02 AM, OrbitalManeuvers said:

I had that same error when trying to unzip the 32k moon zip, also from ballisticfox, when using Windows 10 shell. I installed 7zip and that worked.

I had the same error for the UHD textures. Unzipping with 7-Zip works, weirdly. 

On 4/23/2024 at 7:56 AM, Dreamliner said:

weird, also if anyone has site ideas lemme know, waiting to have enough for update 2  

Not a site suggestion, but could you include optional KSCSwitcher configs so that we can see the launch sites from the space center view?

38 minutes ago, editor99 said:

Unzipping with 7-Zip works, weirdly.

I believe ballisticfox has said it elsewhere, apparently it's because the codec (?) used for compressing the files isn't supported by the windows file explorer zip extractor however it is supported by 7zip

14 hours ago, editor99 said:

I had the same error for the UHD textures. Unzipping with 7-Zip works, weirdly. 

Not a site suggestion, but could you include optional KSCSwitcher configs so that we can see the launch sites from the space center view?

Theres no real way to do that without messing up the sites themselves, but I think in the options for kerbal konstructs in the difficulty settings theres a option for you to view your last used launch site instead of the ksc, you might like that
Working on SaxaVord!

Any chance we could get configs that work with standard KSRSS? I've tried downloading Earth UHD, but Kopernicus doesn't have a good time and fails to load KSRSS on main menu, which I have already reached out for help on (over on Discord). 

Great mod!

Any chance we could get configs that work with standard KSRSS? I've tried downloading Earth UHD, but Kopernicus doesn't have a good time and fails to load KSRSS on main menu, which I have already reached out for help on (over on Discord). 

Great mod!

I wish I could but its really a huge headache, essentially I'd have to do everything a second time , and i really dont have time for that with end of year stuff right now, maybe in the future

@Dreamliner The OP mentions Earth UHD as a dependency. The discord link gives me "This content is no longer available." Am I having some sort of permissions error on my end, or if the link is outdated can you please update it?

P.S. I did the obvious web searches for variants of "EarthUHD AND kerbal" and either get only this thread, or if I widen the search I get a bunch of unrelated photos of Earth.

On 5/6/2024 at 3:09 PM, DeadJohn said:

@Dreamliner The OP mentions Earth UHD as a dependency. The discord link gives me "This content is no longer available." Am I having some sort of permissions error on my end, or if the link is outdated can you please update it?

P.S. I did the obvious web searches for variants of "EarthUHD AND kerbal" and either get only this thread, or if I widen the search I get a bunch of unrelated photos of Earth.

heres the link while I update it, its straight to fox's download so be warned https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1187890442373693501/1198053763487903814/EarthUHD.zip?ex=663b68c3&is=663a1743&hm=b4c45ed129469e1e4a387c6b5e088d6c8dc85053ea2c5099ddebfdee6f5369a9&
just a fyi to keep this thread alive, ill get back to working on sites soon, finals are just taking priority

Until Dreamliner returns and fixes his links here is how to download and install EarthUHD;

-Go to BallisticFox0's Discord. (invite link below)

https://discord.gg/H6JMRyPxpT

-Go to the rules channel and agree to them gain full channel access.

-Open the KSRSS Reborn section.

- Open KSRSS-installation text channel.

- Earth UHD download is at the bottom of the second post. Download this and any one of the three texture packs.

- Download and unzip (You will need 7zip to unpack the files properly.)

-Install EarthUHD into GameData.

You will also need BallisticFox's fork of Kopernicus. (linked below)

https://github.com/ballisticfox/Kopernicus/releases

BallisticFox also has HD Moon and HD Mars textures available, they look great!

Edited May 20 by OHN
